1324:2: sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanaṃ ca paścimam|
1324:3: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ|
1324:4: yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante|
1324:8: yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca|
1324:9: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne|
1324:10: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā'vaśyaṃ dadāti|
1324:11: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa|
1324:12: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nipuṇakārī bhavati yadut dāne|
1324:13: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti|
1324:14: nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam|
1324:15: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne|
1324:16: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti|
1324:17: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ anavadyakārī bhavati yaduta dāne|
1324:18: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti|
1324:19: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne|
1324:20: yathā dāne evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsu yathāyogaṃ veditavyam|
1324:21: eta eva catvāra ākārā niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca|
1324:23: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam|
1324:28: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ|
1324:29: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti|
1324:36: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
1324:42: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati|
1324:48: iha bodhisattvo yatkiñcidebhistribhirmukhairupacitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sukṛtakarmāntatayā kauśalyena parānugraheṇa ca tatsarvamatītānāgatapratyutpannamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ghanarasena prasādena pariṇāmayati|
1324:49: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya [trā] nuttarāmeva samyaksaṃbodhim|
1324:50: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca|
1324:51: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā|
1324:52: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhavanto'bhisaṃbhotsyante'bhisaṃbudhyante ca sarve te ebhireva caturbhirdharmaiḥ|
1324:54: evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati|
1324:55: api tu gṛhiṇo bodhisattvasyāntikātpravrajitasya bodhisattvasya sumahān viśeṣaḥ|
1324:57: tathāhi pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavatyādita eva tāvanmātāpitṛputtadārādikalatraparigrahadoṣāt|
1324:59: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavati tasyaiva parigrahasyārthe kṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi-parikleśe vyāsaṅgaduḥkhebhyaḥ|
1324:61: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattva ekāntasaṅkalīkṛtaṃ brahmacaryaṃ śaknoti carituṃ [na tu] gṛhī bodhisattvaḥ|
1324:62: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu kṣiprābhijño bhavati|
1324:63: yadyadeva kuśalamārabhate tatra tatraiva laghuladhveva niṣṭhāṃ gacchati|
1324:65: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vrataniyame sthitatvād ādeyavacano bhavati|
